title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Experiential Learning on Cartesian Coordinates for Engineering Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can accurately measure coordinate values in physical space using a 2D Cartesian coordinate system.
Learners can connect coordinate system concepts to graphical interfaces and physical experimental equipment for explanation.
Learners can design a simple robot control scenario based on acquired coordinate data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
